channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Illinois AG responds to Trump's push to send National Guard to Chicago

item.title: War in Gaza moves into its third year. And, Trump's power to deploy the National Guard
item.description: The Israel-Gaza war moves into its third year today. And, examining President Trump's power to deploy the National Guard.

item.title: Supreme Court hears arguments on whether states can ban conversion therapy for LBGTQ+ kids

item.title: Renewables overtake coal as world's biggest source of electricity
item.description: Developing countries lead the historic clean energy charge but the US and EU rely more on fossil fuels than before, a think tank study shows.

item.title: Third person dies from methanol poisoning in Brazil
item.description: Authorities are investigating the source of the tainted drinks, which have affected more than 200 people.

item.title: Fifa accuses Malaysia of faking foreign-born players' eligibility
item.description: The alleged forgery was done to comply with Fifa's 'grandfather rule' for foreign-born players.

item.title: Canadian marine park threatens to euthanise 30 beluga whales
item.description: The Canadian government blocked Marineland's attempt to export the animals to a park in China.

item.title: Army general named as Madagascar PM to quell Gen Z protests
